title: From ancient Rome to today, war-makers have talked constantly about peace
description: In a week filled with news about President Donald Trump's aggressive moves to take control of Greenland, the world got a window into his thinking about the concept of "peace."

title: Staff clear massive fly-tip pile from ancient wood
